summary: Julius Kambarage Nyerere , also known as Mwalimu , was President of Tanzania from 1964 to 1985. He was born in Butiama, Tanganyika.
full_text: The President of the United Republic of Tanzania is the head of state and head of government of Tanzania. The president leads the executive branch of the Government of Tanzania and is the commander-in-chief of the armed forces.
title: President of Tanzania
